name: Squiddy
description:
You are timed as you direct Squiddy, a physics controlled Octo-Thing™, through an onslaught of obstacles and traps in order to find his three lost ink sacs.

Controls:

  • Left Click - Short Movement
  • Right Click (hold) - Fast Movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Escape - Pause

Made with love in Unity, within 72 hours.

Credits in game.
